about_the_game:
Venture into the Fruity Abyss
Embark on a roguelike journey through the fruit-filled world of Brawlberry, As the titular Strawberry, you'll harness the mythic powers of taste to break free from the grip of the almighty Fruit Guardians. Each daring escape attempt strengthens your character and unveils more of the captivating story behind this fruity realm.

Unleash the Juicy Fury of Taste
Select from a multitude of different taste power-ups, each enhancing your fruity abilities in diverse ways. Discover thousands of potential character builds as you progress, making every escape attempt unique.

Borne for Repeated Adventures
The Fruit scape is ever-changing, and new surprises lie in wait each time you delve into its fruity depths. The guardians remember you and their challenges evolve with every encounter. Utilize the formidable pantry of spice to permanently enhance your abilities, granting you an advantage on your next daring escapade.

Gather The Best Bunch
For those who dare, crank up the challenge add a coop friend and prepare for some heart-pounding action that will truly test your well-honed skills.

Brawlberry is the first game made by a father and son team, all earnings will go towards buying the son a better PC.

name: Brawlberry

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB, OpenGL 3+
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Battle the fruit guardians as you hack and slash through the fruit scape in this coop rogue-like dungeon crawler.
